data.title: Rodney Daniel Hatch Obituary 2022

data.text:
RODNEY DANIEL HATCH

Funeral services for Rodney Daniel Hatch will be held at 9:00 a.m. on Thursday, November 17, 2022 at his residence, 852 Chief Ignacio Street Towaoc, Colo. Interment will follow at Cortez Cemetery. There will be a wake starting at 7:00 p.m. on Wednesday, November 16 at the residence.

Rodney was born June 4, 1959 in Cortez the son of Pearl Alice Arkansas and Daniel Hatch. He passed away on Wednesday, November 9, 2022 at the age of 63.

Surviving Rodney are his wife, Arlene Ilene Hatch of Towaoc; his daughter, Miracle Hatch (Tristan Watts) of Towaoc; by his siblings, Azalea Dutchie of Towaoc, Fredrick “Wolf” Hatch of Towaoc, Fredrick Hatch of Phoenix, Ariz., Elizabeth Arkansas of Fort Duchesne, Utah, Kate Arkansas of Towaoc, and by Bonnie Colorow of Towaoc; by his seven sons, The Lang Boys; and by numerous grandchildren. Rodney was preceded in death by his parents; Daniel Hatch and Pearl Alice Arkansas; by his adoptive parents, Edward Dutchie Sr. and Patty Dutchie; and by his brother, Edward Dutchie Jr.
